oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Memphis Sounds with George Klein - Episode #1
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: television; Klein, George; music; Alexander, James; Bar-Kays; McCormack, John "Bad Dog"; radio; Samudio, Sam "The Sham"; Dickinson, Jim;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: George Klein and James Alexander of the Bar-Kays discuss NARAS and the state of the Memphis music scene, and an archival clip of the Bar-Kays performing is shown. Sam the Sham discusses his family, family name, and the beginnings of The Pharoahs. "Bad Dog" McCormack discusses his career as a comedian and as a DJ at Rock 103. Jim Dickinson tells of growing up in the Memphis music scene.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: WYPL
